casebody.data:
Gregory Lynn GORDON
v.
Frank L. PERRY, Secretary, Department of Public Safety Susan R. White, Superintendent, Alexander Correctional Institution. No. 132P11-9. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 8, 2016. Gregory Lynn Gordon, for Gordon, Gregory Lynn. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 5th of February 2016 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Union County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of February 2016."
